My personal settings for [AstroNvim](https://github.com/AstroNvim/AstroNvim.git).

## Installation

This repo should be cloned under `/lua/user`, i.e. as

```shell
git clone git@github.com:crisbh/astronvim_config.git ~/.config/nvim/lua/user
```
